entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 08:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this morning then snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
